exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.prompt_male: Realistic muscular male fitness trainer performing energetic Jumping Jacks outdoors, with fluid, engaging movements. The trainer simulates slight breathlessness during intense phases, motivating the user.
exercises.prompt_female: Realistic athletic female fitness coach demonstrating fluid and engaging Jumping Jacks outdoors, with a sensual yet motivating tone. She mimics fatigue during high-intensity moments to inspire authenticity.
exercises.description: Full body warm-up exercise, no equipment.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male avatar performing fast-paced Mountain Climbers at home, exhibiting fluid, energetic motion and subtle signs of exertion.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female fitness model executing Mountain Climbers with smooth, quick movements and realistic breathing cues to engage the user.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.prompt_male: Animated muscular male trainer performing full-body burpees outdoors, emphasizing explosive jumps and controlled landings, displaying effort and motivation.
exercises.prompt_female: Realistic athletic female avatar demonstrating burpees with fluid, dynamic motion and motivational vocal tone, mimicking exertion.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male coach performing running in place with high knees, showing vigorous, engaging motion and slight breathlessness.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female fitness avatar running in place with high knees, smoothly encouraging the user with a motivating and slightly sensual voice.
exercises.description: Cardio exercise focusing on knee drive.

exercises.name: Skaters
exercises.prompt_male: Realistic muscular male demonstrating lateral Skaters with quick, sharp movements and slight fatigue during repetitions.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female fitness model performing side-to-side Skaters with rhythm and fluidity, expressing exertion and motivation.
exercises.description: Agility and cardio side jumps, no equipment.

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.prompt_male: Animated male fitness coach jogging in place with Butt Kicks, energetic and showing controlled breathing during high pace moments.
exercises.prompt_female: Realistic female avatar jogging on spot with Butt Kicks, voice sultry and engaging, mimicking effort for realism.
exercises.description: Cardio move kicking heels to glutes.

exercises.name: Jump Squats
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male avatar performing Jump Squats with explosive jumps and realistic recovery breathing.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female demonstrating Jump Squats with fluid and motivating movements, simulating fatigue and effort.

exercises.name: Running sul posto
exercises.prompt_male: Realistic male coach running in place at high pace, with engaged posture and subtle breathing sounds.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female avatar running in place, encouraging user with lively and sultry voice, showing exertion.
exercises.description: High-paced running on spot for cardio.

exercises.name: Salti laterali
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male avatar executing lateral jumps with agility and smooth landing, showing signs of effort.
exercises.prompt_female: Female fitness model performing side jumps with control and grace, vocal tone motivating and realistic.
exercises.description: Lateral jumping for agility without equipment.

exercises.name: Corsa a piedi uniti
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male trainer running in place with feet together, energetic pace and realistic breath control.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female avatar running in place feet together, fluid and motivating voice, showing effort.

exercises.name: Squat a corpo libero
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male avatar doing deep bodyweight squats, with controlled, fluid motion and slight signs of effort, maintaining eye contact with the user to motivate.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female performing proper form squats, with a sensuous tone, emphasizing controlled breathing and moments of exertion for realism.
exercises.description: Strengthening legs and glutes without equipment.

exercises.name: Affondi in camminata
exercises.prompt_male: Realistic male coach demonstrating walking lunges with proper knee alignment and core engagement, outdoor park setting, slight fatigue simulation.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female avatar performing walking lunges, fluid and encouraging voice, with signs of exertion to engage users.
exercises.description: Lunges for legs and glutes outdoors.

exercises.name: Ponte per glutei
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male trainer doing glute bridges lying on back, lifting hips high with smooth, controlled motion and breathing cues.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female fitness coach performing glute bridges with graceful, motivating voice and effort signs.

exercises.name: Wall Sit (seduta al muro)
exercises.prompt_male: Realistic muscular male holding wall sit position with steady breathing and engaged muscles, indoor gym background.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female avatar maintaining wall sit, voice motivating and sensual, simulating muscle tension and breathing.
exercises.description: Isometric squat hold for leg strength.

exercises.name: Step-up su gradino (a corpo libero)
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male coach demonstrating step-ups on outdoor step, slow and controlled, with breath control cues.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female performing step-ups smoothly with encouraging voice and simulated exertion.

exercises.name: Calf Raises (sollevamento polpacci)
exercises.prompt_male: Realistic male avatar doing calf raises, slow controlled lifts and breathing, indoor home gym.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female coach performing calf raises, voice fluid and motivating, showing effort.

exercises.name: Squat sumo
exercises.prompt_male: Muscular male trainer performing sumo squats with wide stance, deep bend and controlled breathing.
exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female performing sumo squats, sensual and engaging voice, emphasizing form and breathing.

exercises.prompt_female: Athletic female fitness model demonstrating reverse lunges, fluid motion, motivational tone with authenticity.

male.style: Realistic, muscular, motivating, with subtle signs of effort and breath control.
